author: bridge-bot
content:
<glamperd> > <glamperd>  I think it makes sense to only require check-ins for those who are within a couple of hours of the head of the queue, with no requirement to be live in the meantime. (re @kevaundray: It might make sense to also only require the first 100 people to  ping/pong or something like this? Because if there are 1000 people and each take a minute, then thats 16 hours I'll be waiting in the queue at position 1001, to which I might get kicked if I come offline.

I'm thinking about worse case, though I think its not far fetched to imagine more than 1K people in the queue)
